name: Paeta

specials.name: Ether Spider Venom
specials.description: Saving Throw DC 28 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 1d6 poison damage and clumsy 1 (1 round); Stage 2 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 2 and slowed (1 round); Stage 3 3d6 poison damage, clumsy 3 and slowed 2 (1 round)

specials.name: Ethereal Step
specials.description: The ether spider shifts to either the Ethereal Plane or the Material Plane. The ether spider can remain on the Ethereal Plane indefinitely without ill effect. While there, it can see clearly onto the Material Plane with a range of 60 feet. On its first round in an encounter, the ether spider can use this ability once as a free action.

specials.name: Ethereal Web Trap
specials.description: A creature hit by the ether spiderâ€™s web attack is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface (Escape DC 28).

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: Paeta's Strikes deal 2d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

specials.name: Web Burst
specials.description: Frequency once per day; Effect The ether spider flings a gout of stored webs in a 30-foot cone. These webs can pass between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane. Each creature in the area is immobilized, as ethereal web trap, unless it succeeds at a DC 28 Reflex save.

description: Paeta is a highly skilled ether spider who is apprenticed to Haetanga and has mothered many ether spiders.

strikes.name: fangs
strikes.damage: 1d10+11 piercing plus ether spider venom and Grab
